Title: Counting Bytes Faster Than You‚Äôd Think Possible
Description: Summing ASCII Encoded Integers on Haswell at the Speed of memcpy turned out more popular than I expected, which inspired me to take on another challenge on HighLoad: Counting uint8s. I‚Äôm currently only #13 on the leaderboard, ~7% behind #1, but I already learned some interesting things. In this post I‚Äôll describe my complete solution (skip to that) including a surprising memory read pattern that achieves up to ~30% higher transfer rates on fully memory bound, single core workloads compared to naive sequential access, while apparently not being widely known (skip to that).

Title: Scaling past 1 million ELF symbol relocations
Description: Note This is a follow up to my previous post on speeding up elf relocations for store based systems.
